attributes.review: So I downloaded this app. After I first opened it I started to notice something strange happening inside me. The first effect was mild. I turned on Fox News for the first time and gradually started watching it daily. Then it stated to get weird. At night I would have nightmares and wake up screaming “build that wall” and “lock her up”. As the days went on, my brain was getting foggier and cloudier until I could barely form a sentence. I was oddly attracted to my daughter and became aggressive with the women in my office. The final straw was that I saw a BLM protest and this projection appeared on the inside of my eyelids that read “terrorists”. I screamed in horror and immediately deleted the app. Instantly my brain cleared and I could form a rational thought again. That goodness I didn’t get corona virus after I burned all my masks. Does anyone know of another app where I can make public apologies?
attributes.title: Almost made me a racist

attributes.review: This app is terrible. It hurts my eyes to see such a racist man as president. I just wish he could be replaced by Obama!
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I downloaded it to see some news, and all of a sudden my phone turned into an orange… Definitely do not recommend. Now I have to go buy myself a new phone🤦🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: If your gonna bam tik tok we’re gonna ban this
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I just couldn’t stand not getting the facts and seeing all this fake news. THIS APP WOULD NOT OPEN, it kept crashing on me, and then it deleted all of my photos. Like what? I want my stuff back. This app is absolute garbage, location? Why does it need my location? I would rate this 0 stars if I could. Bad app.
attributes.title: Get Rid Of This App

attributes.review: This app will hack all your social media and delete all your stuff and turn you into a Karen don’t get it it’s not worth your time
attributes.title: What happened to Addison raee

attributes.review: I originally got the app to keep up with our orange baby but to my surprise he decided to take over my phone I could no longer do simple things like text and call people and then about is nowhere my phone kept saying at random time trump 2020 I could not have that around my Mexican parents I would have gotten the chancla. I quickly deleted the app and had to give it a 1 star rating
attributes.title: I almost got the chancla

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see news on the trump administration and all I got was a bunch of pictures of a cheeto in a wig
attributes.title: Delete this App

attributes.review: I downloaded this app by accident and I was heavily disappointed by the results. There’s no point of this app AT ALL. It’s pretty much useless and has no purpose to be on the App Store. Extremely disappointed
attributes.title: WHY IS THIS ON THE APPSTORE
